0101.name: Unknown
0101.message:
Either the network is experiencing high
traffic volumes or the service is down.
Please try again later.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com
0101.long_description: The game server you have been trying to connect is currently under maintenance.
0101.long_solution: Check our [Network Status page](https://stats.uptimerobot.com/R7E4wiGjJq) or join our [Discord server](https://invite.gg/pretendo) for updates.
